data.comment: Vitesse kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Armando Broja scores to make it 0-1 at Cars Jeans Stadion.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Oussama Tannane is booked for the away team.
Red card in Den Haag! Oussama Tannane has been shown a second yellow card by Richard Martens.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Den Haag with the kick-off.
Ravel Morrison is replacing Samy Bourard for Den Haag at Cars Jeans Stadion.
Aleksandar Rankovic (Den Haag) is making a second substitution, with David Lennart Philipp replacing Lassana Faye.
In the minute 55, Aleksandar Rankovic is making the team's third substitution at Cars Jeans Stadion with Michiel Kramer replacing Vicente Besuijen.
Vitesse's Jacob Rasmussen has been booked in Den Haag.
The home team have replaced Amar Catic with Nikos Karelis. This is the fourth substitution made today by Aleksandar Rankovic.
In the minute 70, At Cars Jeans Stadion, David Lennart Philipp has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Idrissa Toure is replacing Lois Openda for the away team.
Armando Broja puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 72, Eli Dasa with an assist there.
Den Haag make their fifth substitution with Ilay Elmkies replacing Dante Rigo.
Oussama Darfalou is on a sub for Armando Broja for Vitesse.
In the minute 79, Thomas Letsch (Vitesse) is making a third substitution, with Thomas Buitink replacing Riechedly Bazoer.
Thomas Letsch is making the team's fourth substitution at Cars Jeans Stadion with Filip Moller Delaveris replacing Daan Huisman.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
Ravel Morrison (Den Haag) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
